title: London College of Communication
content:
Part of the [University of the Arts London](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922134640/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20the%20Arts%20London) (until recently called the [London Institute](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922134640/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20Institute)), together with [Camberwell Collge of Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922134640/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Camberwell%20Collge%20of%20Arts), [Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922134640/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Central%20Saint%20Martins%20College%20of%20Art%20and%20Design), [Chelsea College of Art and Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922134640/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chelsea%20College%20of%20Art%20and%20Design), and the [London College of Fashion](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922134640/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20College%20of%20Fashion).

LCC was formally known as LCP (the [London College of Printing](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922134640/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20College%20of%20Printing)).

Their website is: [http://www.lcc.arts.ac.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922134640/http:/www.lcc.arts.ac.uk/)
author: dan_reynolds
